English: In case of an emergency, it's important to stay calm and call for help.
French: En cas d'urgence, il est important de rester calme et appeler l'aide.

English: It's important to have a first aid kit available in case of minor injuries or illnesses.
French: Il est important d'avoir un kit d'urgence disponible en cas de blessures ou maladies mineures.

English: If you experience any symptoms of a serious medical condition, seek immediate medical attention.
French: Si vous expériencez des symptômes d'une condition médicale grave, recherchez l'attention médicale immédiate.
